channel.title: Run server wont work
channel.description:
run.bat for server wont run it this is how it looks like @echo off title server Dev Server java -server -Xmx256m -classpath build\classes\*;lib\* org\cmpoon\server.name\server\core echo Server ended. Bye! pause
it just says could not find or load main class......
can someone please help me? :D

item.title: Run server wont work
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

This should help
What does “Could not find or load main class” mean?

item.title: Run server wont work
item.dc:creator: @melat97 melat97
item.description:
@melat97 wrote:

run.bat for server wont run it this is how it looks like
@echo off
title server Dev Server
java -server -Xmx256m -classpath build\classes*;lib* org\cmpoon\server.name\server\core
echo Server ended. Bye!
pause

it just says could not find or load main class…

can someone please help me?

Read full topic
